title: Datadog Python Integration Registry Schema (Current State)
description: Schema matching the current fields generated by populate_registry.py.

integrations.description: List of all Datadog integration definitions.

integration.description: Schema for a single integration definition (current state).

integration_name.description: Canonical integration name used within ddtrace (lowercase, snake_case).

is_external_package.description: True if this instruments an external PyPI package, False for stdlib/internal/testing.

dependency_name.description: Optional: List of primary PyPI package names instrumented (present if is_external_package=true and dependencies exist).

is_patchable.description: True if this integration exists as a key in ddtrace._monkey.PATCH_MODULES.

is_deprecated.description: True if this integration is deprecated and will be removed in a future release.

patched_by_default.description: Optional: Default patch status (True, False, CONFIG_*, DYNAMIC(*), MISSING*). Generally present only if is_patchable=true or status is MISSING.

instrumented_modules.description: Optional: List of Python module paths targeted by instrumentation (present if is_patchable=true).

tested_version_min.description: Optional: Minimum explicit version found in test lockfiles (present if is_external_package=true and versions found).

tested_version_max.description: Optional: Maximum explicit version found in test lockfiles (present if is_external_package=true and versions found).

tested_versions_list.description: Optional: Explicit list of all versions found in test lockfiles (present if is_external_package=true and versions found).

version_range.description: Future Goal: Supported version range as a PEP 440 string specifier (e.g., '>=1.0', '>=1.1,<3.0').

patched_methods.description: Future Goal: List of key functions/methods patched by the integration.

description.description: Future Goal: Brief description of the integration.

category.description: Future Goal: Primary category (e.g., web_framework, database, rpc, messaging, internal, stdlib, testing).

sub_category.description: Future Goal: Sub-category for finer grouping (e.g., kv-store, relational, document).

configurations.description: Future Goal: List of relevant DD_ environment variables used for configuration.

features.description: Future Goal: List of features supported (e.g., distributed_tracing, log_correlation, dbm_propagation, appsec).

feature_tests.description: Future Goal: Map linking feature names to relevant test cases/files.

additionalProperties.description: List of test file paths or specific test function identifiers.
